articles.title: What To Expect When Biden Meets Xi Jinping In San Francisco Today - NDTV
articles.description: US President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping will meet on Wednesday before a summit of the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum in San Francisco, seeking to reduce friction in what many see as the world's most dangerous rivalry.
articles.content:
Both leaders are meeting on the sidelines of the APEC summit as both countries seek to stabilize ties.
San Francisco: U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping will meet on Wednesday… [+3726 chars]
